title: Can't post in team recuitment
body: Every time I go to post in team recruitment is says I cant because I'm level 6 but in level 30

replies.body:
Hey Harizin,

Your Summoner Level has been updated and you should now be able to post in the Team Recruitment page. Please keep in mind, however, that if you're looking for people to play with on the North American servers, you should post in the NA Team Recruitment sub-board located at http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment .
